data.text: @NBCDFW How about all the women not attend? Give people a clue how it would look without women in it. Black is more of a fashion statement I’d notice no women to accept awards.
@NBCDFW True, but then they wouldn't get their trinket bags and all the parties.
@NBCDFW If they really wanted to protest how about just staying home. Just sayin... Do something that makes an impact, while fashion can do that, in the end actions speak pretty loud.
